title: The MMA Hour with Khabib Nurmagomedov, Derrick Lewis, Holly Holm, Johny Hendricks, Artem Lobov, Tom Lawlor, Marloes Coenen, Greg Hardy
text:
share 
The MMA Hour is back in your life. Below is a rundown of Monday's show: 
1 p.m. ET -- Khabib Nurmagomedov will look ahead to his interim lightweight title fight against Tony Ferguson this Saturday at UFC 209 . 
1:25 p.m. -- "Filthy" Tom Lawlor will join us to talk about the two-year suspension he received from USADA for a recent failed drug test. 
1:45 p.m. -- Marloes Coenen will preview her inaugural Bellator women's featherweight title fight against Julia Budd this Friday night. 
2:05 p.m. -- Johny Hendricks will reflect on his win over Hector Lombard last Sunday night and discuss what's next. 
2:25 p.m. -- Derrick Lewis will look back on his win over Travis Browne last week and talk about what is next for him. 
2:45 p.m. -- Controversial former NFL player Greg Hardy will talk about he's budding MMA career. 
3:10 p.m. -- Artem Lobov will preview his April 22 fight against Cub Swanson . 
3:30 p.m. -- Holly Holm will look back on her controversial loss to Germaine de Randamie earlier this month. 
3:50 p.m. -- We'll answer your #themmahour questions throughout the show on anything and everything going on in the MMA world. Hit us up on Twitter using that hashtag or leave a question in the comments section below. Plus, we'll be taking your calls on anything and everything. Got a question or comment? Give us a call at 1-888-418-4074 . Watch the show live below beginning at 1 p.m. ET / 10 a.m. PT / 6 p.m. GMT .
